data.message: I need to find out why my account is blocked.

replies.message: Hey Jim. You may have been blocked because you used a feature in a way that could be considered abusive, even if you didn't mean to. Blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days. Please sit tight while the ban is in place. For more information, visit: http://bit.ly/2A27sVR. If you believe you were blocked by mistake, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2jqQ8me. -Elizabeth
Elizabeth please help me too. My account was disabled by mistake and yet your team reply "we do not offer support for blocked or disabled accounts". Why is that?

I wasn't abusive, either to others or to the Facebook community standards. I do feel that I was blocked by mistake. That last link that you just shared is to a response portal which I have already used. It doesn't seem to actually serve as an appeal process; it seems to be more of a general feedback so that Facebook can improve. I need to find out why I was blocked. I need someone from Facebook to actually tell me what behavior of mine was inappropriate, lest I repeat it in the future.
Facebook what I find most upsetting is that I have not been told why my account has been blocked. I feel that that is quite unfair.
Ijust went thru the same thing they said they were pertect ing everything bye blocking
Okay save copy delete start over
Sorry only way trust me   your only waisting your time
They never did tell me. I'm back on, after a week in "jail". I still don't know what I did wrong. I guess I'm gonna end up doing it again, whatever it was.
